spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room zoning roughly matches (living/dining left-center, bedrooms right, master top, balconies present), but multiple plan-to-model deviations: (1) Foyer–kitchen boundary is altered into a curved/angled partition not shown in the 2D plan (E5/E2). (2) Several door openings are simplified/relocated (notably around kitchen/foyer, dining-to-bedroom passage, and bathroom entries), with missing swing/orientation fidelity (E2/E3). (3) Window placement is incomplete/ambiguous on exterior walls versus the plan’s indicated openings (E1/E2). (4) Corridor and bathroom proportions appear compressed/reshaped relative to the plan, affecting the central service core and right-side bedroom cluster (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is mostly consistent, but plan-accurate adjacency/embedding is not fully preserved: (1) The small entry-side toilet near the foyer (and/or its exact compartmenting) is not clearly represented as a distinct room in the 3D (E1). (2) Door embedding between tight wet areas and the passage is inconsistent with the plan (several openings appear widened/shifted) (E2). (3) Central toilet cluster/powder room segmentation near dining/bedroom-4 zone appears consolidated or rearranged versus the 2D partitions (E2/E4). No clearly added full extra rooms, but added non-plan partitions/forms are present.

furniture_mapping.notes: Living and dining furniture is broadly consistent with the plan’s intent (sofa grouping in living, dining table centered). Bedroom beds are present but some orientations/placements do not tightly follow the 2D layout (E2/E3). Kitchen cabinetry/appliance placement is stylized and does not strictly match the plan’s counters and fixture positions (E2). Some furniture scale (chairs/sofas) appears oversized relative to circulation widths (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is clear and generally correct; geometry is clean with good lighting and readable room separations. Minor issues: slight perspective/orthographic inconsistency (more perspective than strict axonometric) and some softened/rounded geometry that obscures exact plan compliance (E6). Composition and material clarity are good.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated/unsupported curved or angled partition at the foyer–kitchen boundary; 2D plan shows rectilinear walls.
Entry-side small toilet near the foyer is not clearly present as a distinct enclosed room in the 3D model.
Multiple door openings appear shifted/widened/simplified versus the 2D plan, especially around the dining-to-bedroom passage and wet-area entries.
Door orientation/swing fidelity is not preserved (several doors are missing or shown as open passages without correct directionality).
Several exterior windows indicated in the 2D plan are missing or not placed clearly in the 3D render.
Window placement/extent on some bedroom exterior walls does not match the plan’s marked openings.
Proportion distortion in central corridor/service core: bathrooms and passage widths appear reshaped/compressed relative to plan partitions.
Rendering/stylization (rounded forms/soft edges) reduces verifiability of exact wall/door alignment against the plan.
